:mod:`LogTailer.py` -- A python log tailer
===================================================

.. module:: LogTailer
   :platform: Unix, Linux
   :synopsis: One of the main modules for the Log4Tailer project. It defines all 
              the operations to perform a tail on a given log.
.. moduleauthor:: Jordi Carrillo <jordilin@jordiet.com>

LogTailer class
---------------

.. class:: LogTailer([pause])
   
   Class that parses and tails the log4j logs according to the predefined levels in Log4J, which are
   warn, error, debug, info and fatal.l
   
   .. method:: addLog(Log log)

      Add a Log to be parsed and tailed

   .. method:: posEnd()

      Positions all the cursors to the end of the logs

   .. method:: parse(line)

      Parses a line in the log to check if that line corresponds to a level predefined in Log4J

   .. method:: tailer()

      Method that tails the logs provided in LogTailer
